nodes.bodyText: Maybe something like MatExporter to further indicate the purpose of the class through the name.

I think we should consider making a class holding the keys like "type" or "uuid" as final static strings.
This would make sure that is easy to change them (for example if we want to change lower case to upper case or something like that) and it would probably usueful later in the importer since we will need the keys again there.

@SaMuellerDLR
I changed it, but I am not sure if it is the way you wanted.
We can move this before the if check and then check if (referencedTypeInstance != null)
Should describe the purpose of this function a bit more. I think it was because matlab always generates a "" around the values right?

Method comments are usually done with /** **/
Also could use a @param str in the comment.
